2003-2010: CLE: Lebron James Entered the Leage in 2003 with the Cleveland Cavaliers. As shown there are multiple seasons where he played over 40 minutes. His 3P % was not consistently above 0.35
2010-2014: MIA: Lebron James joined the Miami Heat in 2010. He won 2 championships with the Heat and in those two years his minutes were under 40/game. His 3P% was also improved.
2014-2018: CLE: Lebron James returned to the Cleveland Cavaliers in 2014. He won a championship with the Cavaliers in 2016. Unexpectedly his 3P% was the worst that year within this stint at Cleveland, but his minutes were well managed and his 2P% was high.
2018-2024: LAL: Lebron James joined the Los Angeles Lakers in 2018. He has been playing with the Lakers since then and continued to player fewer minutes than in the beginning of his career. He won a championship with the Lakers in 2020.
